action_parameter_1.description: The Action parameter 1. The value depends on other parameters of the edge rule.

action_parameter_2.description: The Action parameter 2. The value depends on other parameters of the edge rule.

action_type.description:
The action type of the Edge Rule.
Valid values: block_request, disable_optimizer, disable_token_auth, enable_token_auth, force_compression, force_download, force_ssl, ignore_quiery_string, origin_url, override_cache_time, override_cache_time_public, redirect, set_request_header, set_response_header

description.description: The description of the Edge Rule. This field is used internally by Terraform bunny-provider.

enabled.description: Determines if the edge rule is currently enabled or not.

pull_zone_id.description: The ID of the Pull Zone to that Edge Rule belongs.

trigger_matching_type.description:
The trigger matching type.
Valid values: all, any, none

parameter_1.description: The trigger parameter 1. The value depends on the type of trigger.

pattern_matches.description: The list of pattern matches that will trigger the edge rule.

pattern_matching_type.description:
The type of pattern matching.
Valid values: all, any, none

type.description:
The type of the Trigger.
Valid values: country_code, query_string, random_chance, remote_ip, request_header, response_header, url, url_extensions

access_control_origin_header_extensions.description: List of extensions that will return the CORS headers.

add_canonical_header.description: Determines if the canonical header should be added by this zone.

add_host_header.description: Determines if the zone should forward the requested host header to the origin.

allowed_referrers.description: Sets the list of referrer hostnames that are allowed to access the Pull Zone. Requests containing the header Referer: hostname that is not on the list will be rejected. If empty, all the referrers are allowed.

aws_signing_enabled.description: Determines if the AWS signing should be enabled or not.

block_root_path_access.description: Determines if the zone should block requests to the root of the zone.

blocked_countries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be blocked from accessing the zone.

blocked_ips.description: Sets the list of IPs that are blocked from accessing the Pull Zone. Requests coming from the following IPs will be rejected. If empty, all the IPs will be allowed.

blocked_referrers.description: The list of hostnames that will be blocked from accessing the Pull Zone.

budget_redirected_countries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be redirected to the cheapest possible region.

cache_control_browser_max_age_override.description: Sets the browser cache control override setting for this zone.

cache_control_max_age_override.description: Sets the cache control override setting for this zone.

cname_domain.description: The CNAME domain of the Pull Zone for setting up custom hostnames.

connection_limit_per_ip_count.description: Determines the maximum number of connections per IP that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone.

disable_cookies.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should automatically remove cookies from the responses.

enable_access_control_origin_header.description: Determines if CORS headers should be enabled.

enable_avif_vary.description: Determines if the AVIF Vary feature should be enabled..

enable_cache_slice.description: Determines if cache slicing (Optimize for video) should be enabled for this zone.

enable_country_code_vary.description: Determines if the Country Code Vary feature should be enabled.

enable_geo_zone_af.description: Serve data from the Middle East & Africa Zone.

enable_geo_zone_asia.description: Serve data from the Asia & Oceania Zone.

enable_geo_zone_eu.description: Serve data from the Europe Zone.

enable_geo_zone_sa.description: Serve data from the South America Zone.

enable_geo_zone_us.description: Serve data from the US Zone.

enable_hostname_vary.description: Determines if the Hostname Vary feature should be enabled.

enable_logging.description: Determines if the logging should be enabled for this zone.

enable_mobile_vary.description: Determines if the Mobile Vary feature is enabled.

enable_origin_shield.description: Determines if the origin shield should be enabled.

enable_tls1_1.description: Determines if the TLS 1.1 should be enabled on this zone.

enable_tlsv1.description: Determines if the TLS 1 should be enabled on this zone.

enable_webp_vary.description: Determines if the WebP Vary feature should be enabled.

error_page_custom_code.description: Contains the custom error page code that will be returned

error_page_enable_custom_code.description: Determines if custom error page code should be enabled.

error_page_enable_statuspage_widget.description: Determines if the statuspage widget should be displayed on the error pages.

error_page_statuspage_code.description: The statuspage code that will be used to build the status widget.

error_page_whitelabel.description: Determines if the error pages should be whitelabel or not.

follow_redirects.description: Determines if the zone should follow redirects return by the oprigin and cache the response.

ignore_query_strings.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should ignore query strings when serving cached objects (Vary by Query String).

log_forwarding_hostname.description: Sets the log forwarding destination hostname for the zone.

log_forwarding_port.description: Sets the log forwarding port for the zone.

log_forwarding_token.description: Sets the log forwarding token for the zone.

logging_ip_anonymization_enabled.description: Determines if the log anonoymization should be enabled. The field can only be set if the DPA agreement was set in the webinterface.

logging_save_to_storage.description: Determines if the logging permanent storage should be enabled.

logging_storage_zone_id.description: Sets the Storage Zone id that should contain the logs from this Pull Zone.

monthly_bandwidth_limit.description: Sets the monthly limit of bandwidth in bytes that the pullzone is allowed to use.

name.description: The name of the Pull Zone.

optimizer_automatic_optimization_enabled.description: Determines if the automatic image optimization should be enabled.

optimizer_desktop_max_width.description: Determines if the automatic image optimization should be enabled.

optimizer_enable_webp.description: Determines if the WebP optimization should be enabled.

optimizer_enabled.description: Determines if the optimizer should be enabled for this zone.

optimizer_image_quality.description: Determines the image quality for desktop clients.

optimizer_minify_css.description: Determines if the CSS minifcation should be enabled.

optimizer_minify_javascript.description: Determines if the JavaScript minifcation should be enabled.

optimizer_mobile_image_quality.description: Determines the image quality for mobile clients.

optimizer_mobile_max_width.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for mobile clients.

optimizer_watermark_enabled.description: Determines if image watermarking should be enabled.

optimizer_watermark_min_image_size.description: Sets the minimum image size to which the watermark will be added.

optimizer_watermark_offset.description: Sets the offset of the watermark image.

optimizer_watermark_position.description: Sets the position of the watermark image.

optimizer_watermark_url.description: Sets the URL of the watermark image.

optimizier_enable_manipulation_engine.description: Determines if the image manipulation should be enabled.

origin_shield_zone_code.description: Determines the zone code where the origin shield should be set up.

origin_url.description: The origin URL of the Pull Zone where the files are fetched from.

perma_cache_storage_zone_id.description: The ID of the storage zone that should be used as the Perma-Cache.

request_limit.description: Determines the maximum number of requests per second that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone.

storage_zone_id.description: The ID of the storage zone that the Pull Zone is linked to.

type.description: The type of the Pull Zone. Standard = 0, Volume = 1.

verify_origin_ssl.description: Determines if the SSL certificate should be verified when connecting to the origin.

video_library_id.description: The ID of the video library that the zone is linked to.
